title: Goat's cheese chocolate truffles
ingredients: ['150g plain chocolate, at least 70% cacao, chopped', "150g fresh goat's cheese, room temperature", '3 tablespoons icing sugar', '1/4 teaspoon vanilla extract', '1 pinch salt', '1/4 teaspoon cinnamon (optional)', '4 tablespoons cocoa powder for dusting']
